import React from "react"; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import Search from '../components/Search' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from "react-redux"; function Header() { const items = useSelector((state) => state.cartSlice.items) const totalPrice = useSelector((state) => state.cartSlice.totalPrice) console.log('Header', items) function totalCountPizzas() { if (items.length < 1) { return 0 } if (items.length > 1) { items.reduce((acc, el) => { return acc += el.count }, 0) } } const totalCountPizzasC = totalCountPizzas() return (

React Pizza

самая вкусная пицца во вселенной

{totalPrice}₽
{totalCountPizzasC}
) } export default Header
